lines.i: Indication of whether CPR was provided prior to the documenting EMS unit's care

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.125"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11247)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67506-6" CPR prior to EMS arrival NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10163)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10164)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.05

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:10165)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RESP" (CONF:11248)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:10943)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet PriorCareProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.12 DYNAMIC (CONF:10167)
NEMSIS Trace: eArrest.06
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11247)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67506-6" CPR prior to EMS arrival NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10163)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10164)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.05

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:10165)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RESP" (CONF:11248)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:10943)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet PriorCareProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.12 DYNAMIC (CONF:10167)
NEMSIS Trace: eArrest.06

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.125"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1609104024"/> <code code="67506-6" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="CPR prior to EMS arrival NEMSIS"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2014"/> <high value="2014"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="BL"/> <participant typeCode="RESP"> <participantRole> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> </participantRole> </participant> </observation>
